text:
Sikorsky, a Lockheed Martin Company | Staff Data Scientist | Shelton, CT | FULL TIME, ONSITE

Since the flight of the world’s first practical helicopter in 1939, Sikorsky has been a global innovator in rotary-wing aircraft. As a member of our Analytics team, you will use your data science experience to improve operations and reliability for some of the world’s largest helicopter fleets. We are looking for a technical leader who can bring their experience to our team by mentoring data scientists and analysts, exploring new modeling methods, and helping extract new insights from large, challenging data sets.

Please apply through our jobs site, here:

http://search.lockheedmartinjobs.com/ShowJob/Id/83641/Data-S...

http://search.lockheedmartinjobs.com/ShowJob/Id/85447/System...
